revision.text:
The '''Gem Master''' is an [[NPCs|NPC]] in Pok√©clicker. There are two Gem Masters in Pokeclicker, one in Hoenn's Fallarbor Town, and one in Unova's Undella Town. Each Gem Master sells 3 unique [[Flutes]], purchasable with [[Gems]]. ==Shops== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Shops by region |- ! Region !! Flute Name !! Price |- | rowspan=3| [[Hoenn]] (Fallarbor Town) || [[File:Yellow Flute.png|30px]][[Flutes|Yellow Flute]] ||  5,000 [[File:Grass_Gem.png|15px]]
 5,000 [[File:Flying_Gem.png|15px]]
 5,000 [[File:Electric_Gem.png|15px]] |- | [[File:Time Flute.png|30px]][[Flutes|Time Flute]] ||  5,000 [[File:Ground_Gem.png|15px]]
 5,000 [[File:Poison_Gem.png|15px]]
 5,000 [[File:Steel_Gem.png|15px]] |- | [[File:Black Flute.png|30px]][[Flutes|Black Flute]] ||  5,000 [[File:Dark_Gem.png|15px]]
 5,000 [[File:Psychic_Gem.png|15px]]
 5,000 [[File:Fighting_Gem.png|15px]] |- | rowspan=3| [[Unova]] (Undella Town) || [[File:Red Flute.png|30px]][[Flutes|Red Flute]] ||  10,000 [[File:Fire_Gem.png|15px]]
 10,000 [[File:Rock_Gem.png|15px]]
 10,000 [[File:Dragon_Gem.png|15px]] |- | [[File:White Flute.png|30px]][[Flutes|White Flute]] ||  10,000 [[File:Normal_Gem.png|15px]]
 10,000 [[File:Fairy_Gem.png|15px]]
 10,000 [[File:Ice_Gem.png|15px]] |- | [[File:Blue Flute.png|30px]][[Flutes|Blue Flute]] ||  10,000 [[File:Water_Gem.png|15px]]
 10,000 [[File:Bug_Gem.png|15px]]
 10,000 [[File:Ghost_Gem.png|15px]] |} Note: Once you've purchased a type of flute a single time you will have that flute forever. Flutes must be powered with Gems to be used though.
revision.comment: Updating to match new version of source page
